languages.text: {n}Скептически нахмурившись и сделав мощный глоток, Ульфар презрительно кривится и сплевывает.{/n} "Прокислая брага, которую стыдно подавать могучим воинам. Такая безвкусная бурда не подарит радости духа".

{n}Ulfar frowns sceptically before taking a powerful swig. He grimaces with contempt and spits on the ground.{/n} "Serving this sour hogwash to mighty warriors is a disgrace. Such tasteless slop can do nothing to raise the spirit."
languages.original_text: {n}Скептически нахмурившись и сделав мощный глоток, Ульфар презрительно кривится и сплевывает.{/n} "Прокислая брага, которую стыдно подавать могучим воинам. Такая безвкусная бурда не подарит радости духа".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar frowns sceptically, takes a powerful swig. Then he grimaces with contempt and spits.{/n} "Serving this sour hogwash to mighty warriors is a disgrace. This tasteless slop can do nothing to raise the spirit."

{n}Ulfar frowns sceptically before taking a powerful swig. He grimaces with contempt and spits on the ground.{/n} "Serving this sour hogwash to mighty warriors is a disgrace. Such tasteless slop can do nothing to raise the spirit."

languages.text: {n}乌尔法怀疑地皱起眉头，猛地喝了一大口。随后，他轻蔑地做了个鬼脸，朝地上啐了口唾沫。{/n}“让强壮的战士喝这种馊泔水，这简直是耻辱。这种毫无味道的猪食，根本没法让人打起精神。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar frowns sceptically before taking a powerful swig. He grimaces with contempt and spits on the ground.{/n} "Serving this sour hogwash to mighty warriors is a disgrace. Such tasteless slop can do nothing to raise the spirit."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法怀疑地皱起眉头，猛地喝了一大口。随后，他轻蔑地做了个鬼脸，朝地上啐了口唾沫。{/n}“让强壮的战士喝这种馊泔水，这简直是耻辱。这种毫无味道的猪食，根本没法让人打起精神。”

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは懐疑的に眉ひそめたあと、勢いよく一口あおった。彼は軽蔑の表情を浮かべ、地面に吐き出した。{/n}「こんな酸っぱいまがい物を、偉大なる戦士たちに出すとは屈辱だな。こんな味気ない泥水で士気が上がるものか」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar frowns sceptically before taking a powerful swig. He grimaces with contempt and spits on the ground.{/n} "Serving this sour hogwash to mighty warriors is a disgrace. Such tasteless slop can do nothing to raise the spirit."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは懐疑的に眉ひそめたあと、勢いよく一口あおった。彼は軽蔑の表情を浮かべ、地面に吐き出した。{/n}「こんな酸っぱいまがい物を、偉大なる戦士たちに出すとは屈辱だな。こんな味気ない泥水で士気が上がるものか」

languages.text: {n}Ulfar frunce el ceño con suspicacia antes de dar un largo trago de la copa. Hace una mueca de desprecio y escupe el licor al suelo.{/n} «Servir este matarratas a unos guerreros tan formidables como nosotros es una afrenta. Esto es agua sucia y no hace nada por enaltecer el espíritu».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar frowns sceptically before taking a powerful swig. He grimaces with contempt and spits on the ground.{/n} "Serving this sour hogwash to mighty warriors is a disgrace. Such tasteless slop can do nothing to raise the spirit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar frunce el ceño con suspicacia antes de dar un largo trago de la copa. Hace una mueca de desprecio y escupe el licor al suelo.{/n} «Servir este matarratas a unos guerreros tan formidables como nosotros es una afrenta. Esto es agua sucia y no hace nada por enaltecer el espíritu».

languages.text: {n}Şüpheyle kaşlarını çatan Ulfar, güçlü bir yudum alıyor. Horgörüyle yüzünü buruşturup yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Bu ekşi bulaşık suyunu kudretli savaşçılara sunmak resmen rezillik. Böylesine tatsız bir lapayla moral yükseltmek mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar frowns sceptically before taking a powerful swig. He grimaces with contempt and spits on the ground.{/n} "Serving this sour hogwash to mighty warriors is a disgrace. Such tasteless slop can do nothing to raise the spirit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Şüpheyle kaşlarını çatan Ulfar, güçlü bir yudum alıyor. Horgörüyle yüzünü buruşturup yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Bu ekşi bulaşık suyunu kudretli savaşçılara sunmak resmen rezillik. Böylesine tatsız bir lapayla moral yükseltmek mümkün değil."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar fronce les sourcils avec scepticisme en avalant une grande lampée, puis grimace de dégoût et crache par terre.{/n} « Servir cette piquette à de vaillants guerriers est une honte. Une boisson aussi infâme est bien incapable de mettre du baume au cœur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar frowns sceptically before taking a powerful swig. He grimaces with contempt and spits on the ground.{/n} "Serving this sour hogwash to mighty warriors is a disgrace. Such tasteless slop can do nothing to raise the spirit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar fronce les sourcils avec scepticisme en avalant une grande lampée, puis grimace de dégoût et crache par terre.{/n} « Servir cette piquette à de vaillants guerriers est une honte. Une boisson aussi infâme est bien incapable de mettre du baume au cœur. »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar runzelt skeptisch die Stirn, ehe er einen kräftigen Schluck nimmt. Er verzieht angewidert das Gesicht und spuckt auf den Boden.{/n} "Mächtigen Kriegern dieses saure Gesöff zu servieren, ist eine Beleidigung. Ein derart geschmackloser Fusel hebt die Stimmung gewiss nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar frowns sceptically before taking a powerful swig. He grimaces with contempt and spits on the ground.{/n} "Serving this sour hogwash to mighty warriors is a disgrace. Such tasteless slop can do nothing to raise the spirit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar runzelt skeptisch die Stirn, ehe er einen kräftigen Schluck nimmt. Er verzieht angewidert das Gesicht und spuckt auf den Boden.{/n} "Mächtigen Kriegern dieses saure Gesöff zu servieren, ist eine Beleidigung. Ein derart geschmackloser Fusel hebt die Stimmung gewiss nicht."
